Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Board of the TicTacToe game

      Board​(int r, int c)
      Creates a Board object for the game

      • getPlayerAtLocation

        public Player getPlayerAtLocation​(int row,
                                  int column)
        A method to return a reference of a Player to a given spot
        Parameters:
        row - The row to be checked
        column - The column to be checked
        Returns:
        a reference to the Player who owns the tile or null if no one owns it

      • win

        public Player win()
        A method to check if there is a winner in the game
        Returns:
        a reference to the Player who wons the game or null if none

      • tie

        public boolean tie()
        A method to check if the game is a tie
        Returns:
        true if the game has ended in a tie, false otherwise

      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove​(int row,
                        int column,
                        Player player)
        A method to do a Players move and check if it is legal
        Parameters:
        row - The targeted row
        column - The targeted column
        player - a reference to the Player making the move
        Returns:
        true if the move is legal, false if ilegal
